  • Congratulations!

Congratulations!

Whether you’ve engaged in new healing modalities, thought about your needs or just took a few moments to reflect - congratulations! You’re beginning a journey that can be challenging, overwhelming and also rewarding. Whether you tried a bunch of healing modalities, found one that really helped, or just read the back cover, we’re proud of you. You are deserving of healing and patience, and you’re not alone.

We want to leave you with this final quote:

"I am not broken, I am a fluid being ebbing and flowing with the waves of life. And I am searching for the balance within to remain steady in these waves." - CARE Center
